entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the conversation, asking about walking to the World Cup.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley explains that they need to be careful when traveling due to Muggle attention.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is scolded by Mrs. Weasley for lying about having something in his pocket.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley uses her wand to retrieve the Ton-Tongue Toffees from George's pocket.

entities.name: world cup
entities.description: The Quidditch World Cup is mentioned as a huge occasion where they need to be careful when traveling.

entities.name: ton-tongue toffees
entities.description: Ton-Tongue Toffees are small, brightly colored objects that George had in his pocket and were retrieved by Mrs. Weasley.

relationships.description: George has the Ton-Tongue Toffees in his pocket, which are retrieved by Mrs. Weasley.
Mr. Weasley explains that they need to be careful when traveling due to the Quidditch World Cup.
